Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "A Better Life". This movie stars Eddie "Piolin" Sotelo, Robert Peters, Demián Bichir, Demián Bichir, and it tells the story of a gardener in East L.A. who is struggling to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.
I hope this recommendation meets your preferences!

conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: Thanks for all the detail on You. I want to try something more paranormal romance—Maybe I’m overthinking it, but it sounds fascinating.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend "Neighbors". This movie follows five lifelong friends who reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend. The film is well-written and directed with skill. The characters are well-developed and the plot is engaging from beginning to end. Overall, "Neighbors" is a highly recommended movie.
